mapper.update: update MAIL_TEMPLATE_TEXT set MAIL_TEMPLATE_ID = #{mailTemplateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LOCALE = #{locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BODY = #{body,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOCK_VERSION = #{lockVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELETED_FLG = #{deletedFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, MAIL_TEMPLATE_ID, LOCALE, SUBJECT, BODY, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT, LOCK_VERSION, DELETED_FLG from MAIL_TEMPLATE_TEXT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, MAIL_TEMPLATE_ID, LOCALE, SUBJECT, BODY, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT, LOCK_VERSION, DELETED_FLG from MAIL_TEMPLATE_TEXT
